scripts.static: next build && touch out/.nojekyll && echo 'samake.se' > out/CNAME
scripts.deploy: npm run static && gh-pages -d out -t true -f
scripts.deploy_manual: next build && touch out/.nojekyll && git add out/* && git commit -m "Deploy gh-pages" && git push origin `git subtree split --prefix out main`:gh-pages --force
